scripts.deploy: npm run install:db && npm run install:be && npm run install:fe
scripts.install:be: docker exec --rm -it composer:latest composer install && docker exec -it api ./LOCAL/deploy.sh
scripts.install:db: npm run create:db && npm run create:db-user && npm run flush:db
scripts.create:db: docker exec db mysql -uroot -proot -e 'CREATE DATABASE jira;'
scripts.create:db-user: docker exec db mysql -uroot -proot -e "GRANT ALL ON jira.* TO 'laraveluser'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'root';"
